folder: Richmond Road & Summit Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1) 69 Richmond Road, at the N.E. corner of Summit Ave., showing the Fountain House, after extensive alterations. It was built in 1670. Here Margaret Moncrieffe met Captain Coghlan; here, also, Lieutenant Sidney A. Simons, U.S.N., was born.
about 1905 (?)

By Eugene G. Putnam.
Courtesy Staten Island Museum through P. L. Sperr.

(2) Another view of the house from the opposite direction on Richmond Road.

P. L. Sperr.
